mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHARACTER_BOARD SET CB_VIEWS = CB_VIEWS +1 WHERE CB_NO = #{ bno } AND CB_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT CB_NO ,C_NAME ,CB_TITLE ,CB_CONTENT ,CB_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_CHARACTER_BOARD WHERE CB_STATUS = 'Y' AND CB_NO = #{ bno }
SELECT CA_NO ,CB_NO ,CA_ORIGIN_NAME ,CA_CHANGE_NAME ,CA_LEVEL ,CA_STATUS FROM TB_CHARACTER_ATTACH WHERE CA_STATUS = 'Y' AND CB_NO = #{ bno }

SELECT CB_NO ,CB_WRITER ,C_NAME ,CB_TITLE ,CB_CONTENT ,CA_CHANGE_NAME ,CA_LEVEL ,CB_VIEWS ,CB_LIKE ,CB_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_CHARACTER_BOARD JOIN TB_CHARACTER_ATTACH USING(CB_NO) WHERE CB_STATUS = 'Y' AND CA_STATUS = 'Y' AND CA_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CB_CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHARACTER_BOARD( CB_NO ,C_NO ,C_NAME ,CB_WRITER ,CB_TITLE ,CB_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_CBNO.NEXTVAL ,SEQ_CNO.CURRVAL ,#{ charName } ,#{ boardWriter } ,#{ boardTitle } ,#{ boardContent })
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CHARACTER_ATTACH WHERE CB_NO = #{ bno }
mapper.select: SELECT CR_NO ,CB_NO ,CR_WRITER ,CR_GROUP_NO ,CR_PARENT_NO ,CR_STEP ,CR_LEVEL ,CR_CREATE_DATE ,LPAD('@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@', 5*(CR_LEVEL)) || CR_CONTENT AS CR_CONTENT FROM TB_CHARACTER_REPLY WHERE CR_STATUS = 'Y' AND CB_NO = #{ refBno } ORDER BY CR_GROUP_NO ASC, CR_STEP ASC
SELECT CR_NO ,CB_NO ,CR_GROUP_NO ,CR_PARENT_NO ,CR_STEP ,CR_LEVEL FROM TB_CHARACTER_REPLY WHERE CR_NO = #{ reNo } AND CR_STATUS = 'Y'
